Alex R: Candid natural photograph of a man in his late 20s with light stubble and slightly tousled brown hair, wearing a plain charcoal crew neck t-shirt. He has a relaxed expression with a slight natural smile, looking slightly off-camera. Shot in a bright co-working space with large windows, natural daylight streaming in from the left. Blurred desks and a monstera plant in the background. Shot on a 50mm lens at f/2.0 with natural available light. Natural skin texture, not airbrushed. Casual and unstaged feel.
Sarah M: Natural photograph of a woman in her mid 35s with shoulder-length brown hair and warm hazel eyes, wearing a fitted navy blazer over a simple white top. She has a genuine smile, caught mid-conversation. Shot outdoors on a city sidewalk with a blurred cafe storefront and warm string lights in the background. Late afternoon golden hour light from the side. Shot on a 35mm lens at f/1.8 with shallow depth of field. Natural skin with light freckles. Feels like a natural moment, not posed.

Warm indoor ambient light mixed with window light from the right. Coffee cup partially visible at edge of frame. Shot on a 50mm lens at f/1.8. Natural skin texture, not airbrushed. Feels like a profile photo taken during a casual meeting.
